roleset.name: clean a surface of liquid, with a mop or mopping implement

example.name: mop-v: automatically generated
example.text: Never once did she gasp for air or mop her brow .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: That would be a massive nuclear strike , incincerating all opposition before it could mobilize , and using its new warfighter technology to mop up everything else .

roleset.note: MOP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mop' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from mop.01-v predicate notes)
MOPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from mopping.01-n)

roleset.name: clean up with a mop

example.name: mop_up-v
example.text: Meanwhile small communities in Western Australia 's Pilbara region began mopping up on Wednesday after tropical Cyclone Laurence swept through , flattening buildings and uprooting trees .
example.arg: small communities in Western Australia 's Pilbara region
after tropical Cyclone Laurence swept through , flattening buildings and uprooting trees

roleset.note: MOP_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.
